body.p: An important feature provided by container is the System Bar - a fixed-height bar on the page top containing Ericsson-branded colored stripe, application title and a set of custom elements.
Configuration is performed in the file called containerComponents.js, which is located in the root of deployment folder:

Each of the entries in the list array contains a single property, path, which defines the location of the System Bar component file relatively to the index.html. Don't include .js extension in the path.
